name: Drop all columns with fork drop all count

body.query: from test | keep color | drop color | fork (stats c=count()) (stats c=count()) | drop _fork*, c | stats count(*)

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.3.0-0b3d23a51b69fe5b2fc35b1eff90bb7f5270b8b2 "No limit defined, adding default limit of [1000]"
